includedAssets.title: Pilot
includedAssets.synopsis: An unexpected opportunity results in Mike Ross becoming the new associate at a Manhattan law firm. Problem is, he doesn't have a law degree...
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: An unexpected opportunity results in Mike Ross becoming the new associate at a Manhattan law firm. Problem is, he doesn't have a law degree...

includedAssets.title: Errors and Omissions
includedAssets.synopsis: Harvey faces a tough case after he offends a judge, while Louis uses Mike to recruit a new client.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Harvey faces a tough case after he offends a judge, while Louis uses Mike to recruit a new client.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Harvey faces a tough case after he offends a judge, while Louis uses Mike to recruit a new client.

includedAssets.title: Inside Track
includedAssets.synopsis: Harvey recruits Mike to help oust the unfavourable CEO of a crucial client. Mike tries to persuade Trevor to change careers.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Harvey recruits Mike to help oust the unfavourable CEO of a crucial client. Mike tries to persuade Trevor to change careers.

includedAssets.title: Dirty Little Secrets
includedAssets.synopsis: Harvey takes Jessica's ex-husband on as a client and Mike is given his first solo case.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Harvey takes Jessica's ex-husband on as a client and Mike is given his first solo case.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Harvey takes Jessica's ex-husband on as a client and Mike is given his first solo case.

includedAssets.title: Bail Out
includedAssets.synopsis: Harvey must choose between helping his driver and securing a lucrative deal, while Mike must help Trevor restart his life.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Harvey must choose between helping his driver and securing a lucrative deal, while Mike must help Trevor restart his life.

includedAssets.title: Tricks of the Trade
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep6 - Tricks of the Trade
includedAssets.synopsis: Harvey and Mike defend a woman accused of insider training, while Mike helps Rachel study.

includedAssets.title: Play the Man
includedAssets.synopsis: Mike takes part in a mock trial and Harvey is forced to address a complicated relationship.

includedAssets.title: Identity Crisis
includedAssets.synopsis: Mike is assigned to a businessman battling his estranged daughter, but soon finds his secret under threat. Harvey clashes with Louis.

includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: A talented dropout with no law degree stumbles into a job with a top New York City attorney. Stylish drama starring Gabriel Macht and Patrick J Adams.
